wikipedia_page.main: Celia Dale (15 January 1912 – 31 December 2011), was an English author and book reviewer.

response: *January 15 – Celia Dale, English fiction writer and book reviewer (died 2011)
Based on the novel A Helping Hand by Celia Dale.

Born in Exeter, Sarah Harrison is the second of three children of an army officer and a former actress, and a cousin of the novelist Celia Dale. The family spent time during her childhood in Berlin, Singapore, Malaya, then Germany again, before she was sent to boarding school at the age of nine.Author's website. Retrieved 16 April 2014. She took an English degree at the University of London and then worked for four years on the magazine Woman's Own, before becoming a freelance writer.
**Celia Dale, English fiction writer and book reviewer (born 1912
